header.title: Adventist Teams
problem.adam_text: I want to get involved in online mission work, but I’m not sure how... Is there anything I can do?
problem.church_text: We create resources for online outreach, but it only works when people share it. We would love your help and more! Do you have any friends like you?
problem.adventist_text: We’re building an app where Digital Missionaries can find Church Organisations to help acheive their goals.
core.get_points: Complete the mission and receive TMI Points.
core.improve_skills: TMI Points help you unlock awards and training to improve your Digital Missionary skills.
core.youtube_text: Share the link to the page of the new program Unlocking Bible Prophecies
outcomes.title: It’s up to you!
outcomes.work_of_god: “The work of God in this earth can never be finished until the men and women comprising our church membership rally to the work and unite their effort with those of ministers and church officers.”
outcomes.together_make: Together, we’ll make a great team, but we know you have more local influence than us, so you can choose to lead your own mission teams if you like.
outcomes.you_bring: You bring the people, we’ll bring the training.
cta.are_you_ready: Are you ready to change the world
cta.one_digital_mission: one digital mission at a time?
request.title: You can only join the team once you have been invited.
request.beta: The project will soon launch a beta test mode at which point you will receive an invite.
request.name: Name
